title: Bill Announcement – The White House
content:
Statements & Releases			

		National Security & Defense	

Issued on:
May 24, 2019
On Thursday, May 23, 2019, the President signed into law:H.R. 2379, the “Bulletproof Vest Partnership Grant Program Reauthorization”, which permanently reauthorizes the Justice Department’s Bulletproof Vest Partnership Grant Program.
